channel.title: Shop npc help
channel.description:
hi
i am trying to make a shop but when i push trade mij server gets disconnected and in my server prompt it says the following:
java.lang.arrayindexoutofboundsexception: -68 at client.parselincomingpackets<client.java:14274> at client.packetprocess<client.java:13270> at client.process<client.java:13240> at playerhandler.process<playerhandler.java:136> at server.main<server.java:45>
does anyone knows how to fix this
thanks in advance
kevin
